definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: The incense container in the temple is rusty but never empty.
sentences.chinese: 廟裏的香爐鏽跡斑斑但是卻從來不缺少香火。

sentences.english: Highest point for Xianglufeng, altitude 557 metres, commonly known as " devilishly hard to achieve."
sentences.chinese: 最高點爲香爐峯，海拔557米，俗稱“鬼見愁”。

sentences.english: Uzziah, who had a censer in his hand ready to burn incense, became angry.
sentences.chinese: 烏西雅就發怒，手拿香爐要燒香。

sentences.english: Hyangnobong north, Eternal Love Temple West side.
sentences.chinese: 香爐峯北面，遺愛寺西偏。

sentences.english: Hollow-out censer in pea green to bake with glaze and become, a sphere tank shape, .
sentences.chinese: 鏤空香爐以豆綠釉燒製而成，呈圓體罐狀，。

sentences.english: "sunshine incense burners produce purple clouds" Purple is 11 more delicate observation of the experience.
sentences.chinese: “日照香爐生紫煙”的紫是多幺細膩觀察的心得。

sentences.english: A:I'm after some chinese incense burner? How's this one?
The sunshine censer livings purple smoke.
Aaron took the censor and atoned for the sins of the people.
sentences.chinese: 亞倫拿著香爐爲人們的罪贖罪。

sentences.english: Then, methought, the air grew denser, perfumed from an unseen censer.
sentences.chinese: 接着我覺得空氣變得稠密，被無形香爐薰香。

sentences.english: It was the first time that a large steel incense burner made by marquis tang government office with inscriptions were found in nanyang.
sentences.chinese: 南陽首次發現有銘文紀年和唐王府鑄造的大型鐵香爐。

sentences.english: The temple, which lies on the banks of the Yellow River in Jiaxian, Shaanxi Province, is supported by a stone column that is more than 20 meters high.
sentences.chinese: 香爐寺位於陝西省佳縣境內的黃河崖畔。

sentences.english: Finely decorated 16th or early 17th Century Ming dynasty bronze lion form censer.
sentences.chinese: 精美的16世紀或者17世紀初明代獅形銅香爐。

sentences.english: Swung by Seraphim whose foot-falls tinkled on the tufted floor.
sentences.chinese: 提香爐的撒拉弗的腳步聲響在有簇飾的地板。

sentences.english: The monk burned a stick of incense in the incense burner.
sentences.chinese: 和尚在香爐裏焚上一柱香。

sentences.english: Leading a small home on the censer under the provisional steep up a Precipice.
sentences.chinese: 龍頭上置有一小香爐，下臨陡峭的絕壁。

definition: eye-opening ceremony for a religious idol (Buddhism)/to consecrate/to bless/transparent/translucent/haircut/shaving the head or face (humorous)/a method of decoration/first light (astronomy)
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others)/water-lily
ritual money made of paper burnt for the Gods or the dead
